module.sqlWrap: SELECT Top (@Top) * FROM ScheduleLiked WHERE (PassportId=@PassportId) ORDER BY LikedId DESC
SELECT Top (@Top) * FROM ScheduleLiked WHERE (ScheduleId=@ScheduleId) AND (LikedId > @MaxId) ORDER BY LikedId DESC
SELECT Top (@Top) * FROM ScheduleLiked WHERE (ScheduleId=@ScheduleId) AND (LikedId < @MinId) ORDER BY LikedId DESC
SELECT * FROM ScheduleLiked WHERE ScheduleId IN (@ScheduleIds)
SELECT ScheduleId FROM ScheduleLiked WHERE (ScheduleId IN (@ScheduleIds)) AND (PassportId=@PassportId)

DELETE FROM ScheduleLiked WHERE ScheduleId=@ScheduleId AND PassportId=@PassportId UPDATE Schedule SET LikedCount=(select count(1) from ScheduleLiked where ScheduleId=@ScheduleId) WHERE ScheduleId=@ScheduleId

INSERT INTO ScheduleLiked(ScheduleId,PassportId,CreatedTime) VALUES (@ScheduleId,@PassportId,@CreatedTime) UPDATE Schedule SET LikedCount=(select count(1) from ScheduleLiked where ScheduleId=@ScheduleId) WHERE ScheduleId=@ScheduleId SELECT @@IDENTITY
